author: potuz
content: I would suggest goerli to be merged first. Most of the eth2 tests are being carried on that so if there's a failure, people would be likelier to understand. Most  testing on Ropstein is completely indifferent to the merge, so it should be left out to a stage in which merging it's relatively safer

author: potuz
content: I wonder how we'd be merging goerli though. It makes sense to merge Prater, but given the amount of movement we're seeing in trying to put value to goerli ETH, I worry about eventual withrawals there ðŸ˜‚
